ability.Cyclone Shield: For the first 3 turns of the battle, creates a wind barrier that raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage at the end of each turn.
ability.Tempest Fury: Increases the power of Flying-type moves by 50% when HP is below 1/3.

Wind Vortex.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target dizzy for 3 turns. Each end of the turn, the target has a 50% chance to fall asleep. The dizzy condition is removed once it sleeps. This effect will not occur when the target is already in a status.

Metallic Scales.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.

Gale Force.effect: This move has a high critical hit ratio.

Ancient Wisdom.effect: Boosts the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by 1 stage each.
